ing: salt and ground black pepper to taste
des: "This is an awesome stew to make with a leftover ham bone and ham chunks! Great to eat on a cold day and will make your home smell wonderful. This recipe is soy free! Serve with warm biscuits or over a baked potato."
ins: Combine ham bone, potatoes, onion, sweet peas, ham, carrots, and celery in a large pot; pour in enough water to cover all ingredients. Pour in coconut and season with salt and pepper. Bring soup to a boil, reduce heat, and simmer until flavors have blended, about 4 hours. Discard ham bone before serving.
